name: Aurora Store
summary:
The most popular Google Play alternative, featuring a free and Open-Source interface, simple and secure.
Find all your favourite apps. Aurora Store enables you to search for and download apps from the official
Google Play Store.
You can download & install any app directly from Google Play to your device with just a tap.
To use Aurora Store, you can either log in via your Google account or use an anonymous account. Some
features may be limited when using the anonymous account.
